Metadata: Cultivation of microplantlets derived from the marine red alga "Agardhiella subulata" in a stirred tank photobioreactor

This work continues the authors' bioprocess engineering analysis of "Agardhiella" microplantlet cultivation. They report that their stirred tank bioreactor is a suitable configuration for long-term cultivation of "Agardhiella" microplantlets. However, biomass production at high plantlet density can be limited by the carbon dioxide input associated with the aeration gas.
